text: Never Let Me Down Again is a 1987 song by British band Depeche Mode and is the second single from their sixth studio album Music for the Masses. It went to number 22 in the United Kingdom, number 63 in the United States, number 1 in Denmark, number 7 in Switzerland and Sweden, number 12 in Ireland, number 5 in South Africa and Finland, number 82 in Australia and number 2 in Germany. ==Track listings== All songs written by Martin Gore. 7": Mute / Bong14 (UK) #"Never Let Me Down Again" – 4:20 #"Pleasure, Little Treasure" – 2:52 12": Mute / 12Bong14 (UK) #"Never Let Me Down Again (Split Mix)" – 9:34 #"Pleasure, Little Treasure (Glitter Mix)" – 5:34 #"Never Let Me Down Again (Aggro Mix)" – 4:53 12": Mute / L12Bong14 (UK) #"Never Let Me Down Again (Tsangarides Mix)" – 4:22 (Remixed by Chris Tsangarides) #"Pleasure, Little Treasure (Join Mix)" – 4:53 (Remixed by John Fryer & Paul Kendall) #"To Have and to Hold (Spanish Taster)" – 2:33 Cassette: Mute / CBong14 (UK) #"Never Let Me Down Again (Split Mix)" – 9:34 #"Pleasure, Little Treasure (Glitter Mix)" – 5:34 #"Never Let Me Down Again (Aggro Mix)" – 4:53 CD: Mute / CDBong14 (UK) #"Never Let Me Down Again (Split Mix)" – 9:34 #"Pleasure, Little Treasure (Join Mix)" – 4:53 #"To Have and to Hold (Spanish Taster)" – 2:33 #"Never Let Me Down Again (Aggro Mix)" – 4:53 *Originally released in Cardsleeve [1987] *Rereleased as 4track CD single in Slim Jewel Case in 1991.
